original_title: Drum Tao: North American Tour 2018 [Drum Heart]
overview: DRUM TAO brings phenomenal performance on the stage through the Taiko drum which boasts overwhelming sound expression with beautiful melody of Japanese bamboo flute, Japanese 3 strings guitar and Japanese harp.  DRUM TAO's show is contrary to all expectation, "THE LATEST JAPANESE ENTERTAINMENT."
title: Drum Tao: North American Tour 2018 [Drum Heart]
